price: ”Yaa badii kiyya! Odoon ebaluun jaalallee taasifachuu baadheen gaabba!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
